name: Lost Sea (itch) (maskofsin)
description:
Thank you for visiting Lost Sea's project page.

I decided to create this game while I was contemplating quitting my toxic job.

So, this is my first attempt to create a game on my own.

I'm posting this on itch.io to check if there's any intereste on it at all.

Your feedback is greatly appreciated!

Note: This game is still in Beta stages. Many things are going to be done/upgraded when the game is complete.

CHANGELOG:

Beta 0.6 - removed many unnecessary files and resized used files for a smaller size game. This made Android version possible!
